greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of inverse of increasing integers with a difference of 0, 1, 2, 3, ...: 1 - 1/2 + 1/4 - 1/7 + 1/11 - 1/16 + 1/22 - 1/29 + 1/37 + ... i.e., alternating series based on A226985.
mathematica: N[((-2 I) (LerchPhi[-1, 1, 1/2 - (I/2) Sqrt[7]] - LerchPhi[-1, 1, 1/2 + (I/2) Sqrt[7]]))/Sqrt[7], 99] (* _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 09 2013 *)
program: (PARI) -(2*imag(psi((1-I*sqrt(7))/4)-psi((3-I*sqrt(7))/4)))/sqrt(7) \\ sumalt is faster; _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 10 2013
results.author: _Didier Guillet_, Sep 08 2013
